name: No One's Ark
description:
$ check ARK Systems status: 'bunnies' | # ARK Systems status: FAILED TO LOAD | #FAILED TO LOAD | ############# | #awake NOAH_00001101 | #report [CRITICAL: REPAIR UNION ORYCTOLAGUS CUNICULUS] 

Move: W-A-S-D | Pickup critters and items by just running into them | Drop animals and weapons with 'T' | Use weapons with 'E' | Avoid lions, they're nicely paired off as it is.
